extDesc.message: Disable YouTube Shorts effortlessly with this powerful browser extension

homeFeedShortsDesc.message: Hide Shorts videos on the home page

homeFeedLivesDesc.message: Hide Live videos on the home page

homeFeedPremieresDesc.message: Hide Premiere videos on the home page

subFeedShortsDesc.message: Hide Shorts videos on the subscriptions page

subFeedLivesDesc.message: Hide Live videos on the subscriptions page

subFeedPremieresDesc.message: Hide Premiere videos on the subscriptions page

trendingFeedShortsDesc.message: Hide Shorts videos on the trending page

shortsTabDesc.message: Hide the Shorts tab on channel pages

homeTabShortsDesc.message: Hide Shorts videos in the home tab on channel pages

shortsNavigationButtonDesc.message: Hide the Shorts button on the navigation panel

searchResultsDesc.message: Hide Shorts videos in search results

recommendedListDesc.message: Hide Shorts videos in the recommended list on video watch pages

notificationMenuDesc.message: Hide notifications about Shorts in the notification menu

playInRegularModeDesc.message: Play Shorts videos on a regular video page

disabledTwo.message: When HYS is disabled, so are all of its features. This means you will start seeing Shorts content on YouTube again

disabledThreeA.message: You can enable HYS in the

supportThree.message: Open a support ticket on GitHub

feedPageDesc.message: Control the view of Shorts videos on pages such as Home, Subscriptions, and Trending

channelPageDesc.message: Control the view of the Shorts tab and Shorts videos on user's channel pages

miscPageDesc.message: Miscellaneous options for hiding Shorts elements all across YouTube

blockChannelsDesc.message: Enter a channel name to hide content from that channel on the home, subscriptions, trending, and search feeds
